findings.title: Filename used without obvious sanitization
findings.description: Upload filename appears used without obvious normalization/sanitization nearby.
findings.risk: Unsanitized filenames can include traversal sequences, unicode tricks, or dangerous extensions.
findings.confidenceRationale: Heuristic: sanitization may exist in shared helpers; still worth review.
findings.recommendation: Normalize filenames, strip path separators, enforce allowlisted extensions, and generate server-side storage names.
